articles.title: Lino Licuanan
articles.contents:
lino licuanan
      
      
      Articles
      About
      ☰
      
      
      
        
          Lino Licuanan
          
            
                
                  
                    LinkedIn
                  
                
              
                            
                
                  
                    GitHub
                  
                
              
                            
                
                  
                    Email
                  
                
              
                          
        

        
          
      
      
        
          
          
          Bio
          Hi, I’m Lino Licuanan. I’m a product manager with 3 years of experience in the Philippine fintech space (PayMaya, First Circle). Proficient in R & SQL for practical data science & analytics. Graduating MSc Industrial Engineering student @ UP Diliman by end of 2022.
          Particularly interested in products where data plays a central role in delivering superior CX, returns, and social benefit. Happy to consult with organizations on how to go about that.
          In my free time I boulder, go night running, and listen to a ton of podcasts.
          
          
          Experience
          
          PayMaya Philippines, Inc.
          IAM Product Manager | 2/2022 - Present
          
          
          First Circle Growth Finance Corporation
          Product Manager II | 9/2021 - 1/2022
          Summary. Lead PM for the Revolving Credit Line – flexible & immediate access to funds for SMEs. Full stack orchestration of engineering, data, & operations. 2 direct reports, successfully promoting one.
          Product Line Discovery. Validated strategies for enabling customers to substantially grow their revenues, thereby generating organic demand for credit. Roadmap greenlit by CEO and dictated company-wide workstreams for 2022 H1.
          COVID-19 Growth Hacking. Built outbound channels from ground up generating PHP ~500Mn of new business monthly at negligible cost. Reduced 3 of 8 KYC requirements with no risk or acquisition concession, enabling upfront offers pre-customer action. Rationalized pricing discounts that profitably increased retention – peaked at ~93% of business being retention-driven.
          Data Product Manager | 1/2021 - 8/2021
          Summary. Lead PM for 4 Data Engineers and 2 Data Analysts. All initiatives to augment and automate every decision made in First Circle.
          Underwriting Engines. Led initiatives to turn a manual credit limit setting process into an automated recommendation system within 1 month of new product launch. 1-3 hours saved per application and full Risk control over underwriting parameters.
          KYC Processing. Led release of an app that can capture any information and have this used in automation systems. Expanded the universe of underwriting inputs to unlock research on networks, revenues, debt, and margins. Launched a feature that can extract bank statement requirements in <5 minutes.
          Entity Resolution. Led experimentation around use cases for a Graph Database. MVP’d company and person resolution from a gamut of entity sources, powering high precision fraud detection and entity deduplication.
          Data Strategist | 07/2019 - 12/2020
          
          
          Jollibee Foods Corporation
          Management Associate, Future Leaders Program | 7/2018 - 12/2018
          
          
          
          Education
          
          University of the Philippines, Diliman
          MS Industrial Engineering, Human Factors Specialization | 8/2020 - Present
          BS Economics, magna cum laude | 07/2014 - 06/2018
          
          
          
          Technologies
          Product Management. Notion, Asana, Jira, Figma, Pivotal Tracker.
          Data Analysis. SQL, R, Python, Spreadsheets, Minitab, Stata.
          Business Intelligence. Metabase, Neo4j, Superset, Google Data Studio, Anaplan.
          Engineering (PM Capacity). Databases (Postgres), Data Warehousing (dbt), Orchestration (Docker, K8s, Airflow), APIs (REST, GraphQL), CI/CD (GitHub, Selenium), Frontends (Ruby on Rails, Webflow).
          
          
          Volunteering
          GenerationHope, Inc. (Supply Chain & Purchasing). Pro bono work for a social enterprise devoted to creating educational spaces and agricultural opportunity for the underserved.
          UP Economics Society (Finance Director). Led financial operations for a benefit concert that handled P3M in cash flows and generated P1.2M in profit.
          UP Bike Share Project (Executive Vice President). Led projects for a student-led organization managing a bike sharing system and funded with P15M by the DOST.
          UP Marine Biological Society. Coordination of relief operations for communities vulnerable to the adverse effects of climate change.
          AIESEC in UP Diliman. Ambassador for cross cultural volunteer exchange.
          
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Lino Licuanan
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                      LinkedIn
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      GitHub
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      Email

              Particularly interested in products where data plays a central role in delivering superior CX, returns, and social benefit. Happy to consult with organizations on how to go about that.

articles.title: Articles
articles.contents: Lino Licuanan. I’m a product manager with 3 years of experience in the Philippine fintech space (PayMaya, First Circle), and specializing in data products. Graduating MSc Industrial Engineering student @ UP Diliman.This is an attempt at documenting my work and learnings. Will probably get things wrong here and there haha so DYOR.
